appTop.title: Are you looking for employees?
appTop.description: As a staffing specialist, IWEX finds the right personnel for your specific needs – nationwide and across all industries.
appTop.companyDesc: IWEX aims to establish a valuable connection between students, particularly from Kyrgyzstan and Central Asia, and the German job market.

services.title:
Welcome to IWEX
Here are our top 4 staffing services
services.description: Since 2014, we have been connecting motivated students and workers from Kyrgyzstan with German companies to tackle the challenges of the skilled labor shortage together. With our expertise and commitment to excellent service, we are setting new standards in the placement of temporary and permanent jobs as well as training positions.

steps.title:
This is how easy it is to
request staff at IWEX.
steps.card1Desc: Our work doesn't end with the signing of the contract. We support both your company and the employee to ensure successful integration and long-term collaboration.
steps.card2Desc: We collect feedback after each interview and assist you in the decision-making process. Our team coordinates negotiations with the candidate until the contract is signed, ensuring a smooth completion of the process.
steps.card3Desc: We handle the organization of interviews and adjust to your schedule to ensure efficient communication between you and the candidates.
steps.card4Desc: After the pre-selection, we present the best candidates along with detailed resumes and our recommendations. This gives you a comprehensive overview of each candidate before inviting them for an interview.
steps.card5Desc: Our experienced recruiters conduct initial selection rounds, including interviews and skill assessments. We evaluate candidates' professional abilities, experience, and personal qualities to ensure they meet your requirements.

company.title: The story of IWEX
company.description: Nurdin Sheishenov, a graduate in logistics from a German-Kyrgyz university, founded IWEX Germany in 2014 and has been leading the company with a focus on international recruitment and training ever since. His personal journey as a former au pair and his experience as an entrepreneur shape his vision of providing talented students from Kyrgyzstan with access to the German job market.
